Initializer# init(shapes:mode:collisionOptions:filter:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    shapes: [ShapeResource],
    mode: CollisionComponent.Mode = .default,
    collisionOptions: CollisionComponent.CollisionOptions,
    filter: CollisionFilter = .default
)
```
